title: Maybe Forever
description: Is the honeymoon over…?Now married with two children, Laney and Mads are finding their life together isn’t as simple as it used to be. While Laney struggles with motherhood, Mads is so focused on chasing success that he loses sight of promises he’s made. Better apart…?When frustration gets the better of her, Laney takes the kids and goes to the US, hoping to find solace with her aunt Cecily, a former school teacher who now teaches yoga and meditation in Florida.Will Laney and Mads find a way back to one another…or is it too late?
author: Kim Golden
